description.0: A generally balanced class. Slight defense buff and speed debuff.
description.1: A speed-oriented class. Greatly boosts speed while losing in defense, fight points and health points.
description.2: A defense-oriented class. Health points and fight points boost and correct defense. This class is very slow and does not deal a lot of damage.
